text: Ruwer is a municipality (a convention community called Verbandsgemeinde Ruwer) on the River Ruwer. The administrative offices are in the town of Waldrach, and it should not be confused with the nearby town of Ruwer, which is for administrative purposes a part of the city of Trier. == Members == Name Area (km²) 1563 (Fireplaces) 1684 (Fireplaces) 1818 (Population) 2000 (Population) 2015 (Population) Bonerath 4.25 6 6 151 256 245 Farschweiler 7.45 13 8 197 760 784 Gusterath 4.41 5 9 141 2,015 1,891 Gutweiler 2.51 7 7 100 739 648 Herl 2.83 5 7 140 254 268 Hinzenburg 2.87 3 3 82 164 142 Holzerath 6.76 6 5 186 498 429 Kasel 4.53 25 21 255 1,347 1,312 Korlingen 2.08 9 6 97 890 771 Lorscheid 5.09 11 12 187 621 568 Mertesdorf 6.47 20 14 287 1,762 1,650 Morscheid 5.48 17 18 227 821 954 Ollmuth 3.93 4 4 91 174 160 Osburg 33.92 23 17 515 1,943 2,457 Pluwig 4.87 9 9 250 1,231 1,600 Riveris 2.11 4 4 133 364 408 Schöndorf 10.03 12 12 296 831 734 Sommerau 1.04 1 1 29 74 73 Thomm 4.49 16 12 327 1,041 1,050 Waldrach 12.45 53 41 533 2,179 2,027 Σ Ruwer (municipality) 127.57 249 216 4,224 17,964 18,171 == Photos == Image:Grueneberg-mertesdorf- trier.jpg|Grueneberg Image:Naumeter-kupp.jpg|Naumeter Kopf Image:Roesterkopf- anlage.jpg|upright|Roesterkopf == Related pages == *Ruwer-Hochwald-Radweg == Other websites == * Homepage of the municipality * Touristinformation Ruwer * Info on Bonerath * Info on Farschweiler * Info on Gusterath * Info on Gutweiler * Info on Herl * Info on Hinzenburg * Info on Holzerath * Info on Kasel * Info on Korlingen * Info on Lorscheid * Info on Mertesdorf * Info on Morscheid * Info on Ollmuth * Info on Osburg * Info on Pluwig * Info on Riveris * Info on Schöndorf * Info on Sommerau * Info on Thomm * Info on Waldrach Category:Geography of Rhineland-Palatinate
